snippet.title: Find harmony in your life with Hot Ginger
snippet.content: HERE'S your chance, ladies, to give a cappella harmony singing a go by joining the Hot Ginger Chorus's six-week introduction from August 16. Hot Ginger Chorus is offering Sunshine Coast women the course in four-part harmony, with a further opportuinity to then audition and stay on with the group to perform at its 1960s-era concert in October. Participants will learn practical techniques to improve their sound with vocal coaching from Kim Kirkman, Hot Ginger's musical director and former member of The Ten Tenors. The six-week course costs $60 and will be held on Wednesdays from 6.45pm to 8.15pm from August 16 at Maroochydore CWA Hall in Memorial Ave, Maroochydore. For more information, phone Vanessa on 0419258027 or Jenny on 0408 006 881. Or visit Hot Ginger Chorus's members come from across the coastal areas and hinterland of the Sunshine Coast.
